extendedInfo.description: ** BETA, Please contact me by mail to report bugs! **Unmotivated to exercise? Keep Running might help you! With Keep Running, the music on your phone will stop playing while you're speed is under a certain limit. You can easy specify your own preferred  limit. This will make you walk or run in a constant speed, because who wants to miss their favorite music parts?Keep Running can be running in the background while you are using other exercise or music apps. You can either use the pedometer (step counter) or the GPS to determinate your current speed.
